mapper.select: select TOI.order_number from t_order_item toi where toi.order_number ='23-00059108'

select oi.order_number , oi.ws_id , oi.vendor_account_id , oi.vendor_item_id , oi.unit_quantity , oi.box_quantity , oi.delivery_date , ta.customer_account_id as brn from t_order_item oi inner join t_account ta on oi.vendor_account_id = ta.account_id where oi.ws_id = #{wsId} and oi.delivery_date = to_date(#{deliveryDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and oi.order_number = #{orderNumber} and oi.vendor_item_id = #{sku}
select ti.datas from t_interface ti where ti.tx_id = 'KEDM00005_INVOICE_KSTA_0001_202311141656205ea78c1wm2'
select ti.datas from t_interface ti where ti.parents_tx_id = 'KEDM00005_INVOICE_KSTA_0001_20231116113039216ddcxtu1'

select item_seq, ws_id, vendor_item_id, insert_dtm, update_dtm, item_name, sku, brand_id, brand_name, min_order_quantity, is_alcoholic, is_narcotic, default_language, manufacturer_id, has_been_updated, item_type, uncategorized, container_name, container_size, container_unit_of_measurement, container_returnable, container_material, supplier_short_name, country_of_origin, upc, upc_case, upc_unit, oz_per_case, abv, description, hidden, product_class, purpose, item_tax_type, enabled, package_id, package_name, package_count, package_item_count, package_pack, package_size, package_unit_of_measurement, image, vendor_category_id from public.t_item ti where ti.ws_id = #{wsId} and ti.sku = #{sku}
